Parameters:
vfp1 -

Returns:

areInSameOrAdjacentBlocks

public static boolean areInSameOrAdjacentBlocks(long vfp1,
                                                long vfp2)
Returns:
true if vfp2 points to somewhere in the same BGZF block, or the one immediately following vfp1's BGZF block.
